Literature.Title: Broad-spectrum hybrid antimicrobial peptides derived from PMAP-23 with potential LPS binding ability.
Literature.Author: Lyu Y, Tan M, Xue M, Hou W, Yang C, Shan A, Xiang W, Cheng B

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=2µM),Escherichia coli UB1005(MIC=2µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium C77-31(MIC=2µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=4µM)
